answers.answer: I was induced due to preeclampsia and after 60 hrs I ended up with an emergency c section. But only because the cord was wrapping around my son and His heart rate was dropping.
Eek. That's scary!! Yeah my doc won't do a C Section unless it's absolutely necessary.
I was induced with all 3 of my babies and it was no problem what so ever. My last one was about 10 hours from getting to hospital to delivery.  Very easy.
Mine went perfect no problems was in labor almost 8 hours god got this

Good luck. It's possible your baby will come on it's own. I had preeclampsia and my water broke on it's own at 36 weeks. I didn't know I had preeclampsia But it was at the severe point where I was throwing up all night and in pain. The placenta knows that toxins are effecting it and tries to rid the body of it. That's what my doc told me and Why my boy came early on his own. But even then, I had to be put on a magnesium drip for the preeclampsia and then pitocin too to speed up labor Cause magnesium slows it down.horrible horrible stuff Lol.
Thank you ladies!! That makes me feel better. I never wanted to be induced but God had a plan. :) Maybe I'll go into labor on my own too. ;)

question: I just found out today that I will be induced at 37 weeks if I make it thay far due to Pre Eclampsia. I was hoping my body would go into labor itself but I don't think that'll happen. What were your experiences??
title: ladies who have been induced
